UPDATE h_company
id=#id# name=#name# user_id=#user_id# contact_name=#contact_name# contact_name=null contact_phone=#contact_phone# contact_mail=#contact_mail# contact_mail= null fp_name=#fp_name# fp_phone=#fp_phone# fp_telephone=#fp_telephone# fp_address=#fp_address# fax=#fax# fax_ext=#fax_ext# ywyId=#ywyId# status=#status# create_time=#create_time# verify_reason=#verify_reason# verify_user_id=#verify_user_id# com_bank_code=#com_bank_code# verify_status=#verify_status# com_license_no=#com_license_no# com_license_img=#com_license_img# com_tax_no=#com_tax_no# com_tax_img=#com_tax_img# com_dept_code=#com_dept_code# com_dept_img=#com_dept_img# com_duty_no=#com_duty_no# com_bank_name=#com_bank_name# com_account_name=#com_account_name# com_account_no=#com_account_no# remark1=#remark1# remark2=#remark2# remark3=#remark3# remark4=#remark4# remark5=#remark5# remark6=#remark6# credit_code=#credit_code# com_license_start=#com_license_start# com_license_end=#com_license_end# province_code=#province_code# city_code=#city_code# area_code=#area_code# com_address=#com_address# com_zip_code=#com_zip_code# zp_code=#zp_code# zp_province_code=#zp_province_code# zp_city_code=#zp_city_code# zp_area_code=#zp_area_code# zp_address=#zp_address# zp_area_number=#zp_area_number# zp_phone=#zp_phone# zp_bank_code=#zp_bank_code# zp_bank_account=#zp_bank_account# zp_verify_status=#zp_verify_status# verify_status_time=#verify_status_time# zp_verify_time=#zp_verify_time# zp_verify_creater_id=#zp_verify_creater_id# update_time=#update_time# update_operator_id=#update_operator_id# com_business_doc_type=#com_business_doc_type# oneAgentOpenId=#oneAgentOpenId# oneAgentName=#oneAgentName# twoAgentOpenID=#twoAgentOpenID# twoAgentName=#twoAgentName# servicerId=#servicerId# servicerName=#servicerName# rec_phone=#rec_phone# rateFlag=#rateFlag#
where id = #id#

id=#id# name=#name# user_id=#user_id# user_id=#user_id# contact_name=#contact_name# contact_name=null contact_phone=#contact_phone# contact_mail=#contact_mail# contact_mail= null fp_name=#fp_name# fp_phone=#fp_phone# fp_telephone=#fp_telephone# fp_address=#fp_address# fax=#fax# fax_ext=#fax_ext# ywyId=#ywyId# status=#status# create_time=#create_time# verify_reason=#verify_reason# verify_user_id=#verify_user_id# com_bank_code=#com_bank_code# verify_status=#verify_status# com_license_no=#com_license_no# com_license_img=#com_license_img# com_tax_no=#com_tax_no# com_tax_img=#com_tax_img# com_dept_code=#com_dept_code# com_dept_img=#com_dept_img# com_duty_no=#com_duty_no# com_bank_name=#com_bank_name# com_account_name=#com_account_name# com_account_no=#com_account_no# remark1=#remark1# remark2=#remark2# remark3=#remark3# remark4=#remark4# remark5=#remark5# remark6=#remark6# credit_code=#credit_code# com_license_start=#com_license_start# com_license_end=#com_license_end# province_code=#province_code# city_code=#city_code# area_code=#area_code# com_address=#com_address# com_zip_code=#com_zip_code# zp_code=#zp_code# zp_province_code=#zp_province_code# zp_city_code=#zp_city_code# zp_area_code=#zp_area_code# zp_address=#zp_address# zp_area_number=#zp_area_number# zp_phone=#zp_phone# zp_bank_code=#zp_bank_code# zp_bank_account=#zp_bank_account# zp_verify_status=#zp_verify_status# verify_status_time=#verify_status_time# zp_verify_time=#zp_verify_time# zp_verify_creater_id=#zp_verify_creater_id# update_time=#update_time# update_operator_id=#update_operator_id# com_business_doc_type=#com_business_doc_type# oneAgentOpenId=#oneAgentOpenId# oneAgentName=#oneAgentName# twoAgentOpenID=#twoAgentOpenID# twoAgentName=#twoAgentName# servicerId=#servicerId# servicerName=#servicerName# rec_phone=#rec_phone# rateFlag=#rateFlag#

sqlMap.select:
SELECT DISTINCT(a.id),a.name,a.user_id,a.contact_name,a.contact_phone,a.contact_mail,a.fp_name,a.fp_phone,a.fp_telephone,a.fp_address,a.fax,a.fax_ext,a.ywyId,a.status,a.create_time,a.verify_reason,a.verify_user_id,a.com_bank_code,a.verify_status,a.com_license_no,a.com_license_img,a.com_tax_no,a.com_tax_img,a.com_dept_code,a.com_dept_img,a.com_duty_no,a.com_bank_name,a.com_account_name,a.com_account_no,a.remark1,a.remark2,a.remark3,a.remark4,a.remark5,a.remark6, a.credit_code,a.com_license_start,a.com_license_end,a.province_code,a.city_code,a.area_code,a.com_address,a.com_zip_code,a.zp_code,a.zp_province_code,a.zp_city_code,a.zp_area_code,a.zp_address, a.zp_area_number,a.zp_phone,a.zp_bank_code,a.zp_bank_account,a.zp_verify_status,a.verify_status_time,a.zp_verify_time,a.zp_verify_creater_id,a.update_time,a.update_operator_id ,a.com_business_doc_type, a.oneAgentOpenId,a.oneAgentName,a.twoAgentOpenID,a.twoAgentName,a.servicerId,a.servicerName,a.rec_phone,a.rateFlag FROM h_company a left join h_ammeter_info b on a.id = b.c_id
a.id=#id# a.oneAgentName like concat('%',#oneAgentName#,'%') a.twoAgentName like concat('%',#twoAgentName#,'%') a.servicerName like concat('%',#servicerName#,'%') b.pay_status=#pay_status# a.rateFlag=#rateFlag# a.name like concat('%',#name#,'%') a.contact_name like concat('%',#contact_name#,'%') a.contact_phone like concat('%',#contact_phone#,'%') a.status=#status# a.rec_phone=#rec_phone# b.ammeter_no like concat('%',#paymentNo#,'%') a.create_time>=#startTime# a.create_time<=#endTime#
a.oneAgentOpenId=#oneAgentOpenId#
a.oneAgentOpenId=#oneAgentOpenId# and a.twoAgentOpenID is null
a.oneAgentOpenId=#oneAgentOpenId# and a.twoAgentOpenID is not null
order by $sortColumn$
limit #rowStart# , #rowCount#

SELECT count(*) from (SELECT DISTINCT(a.id) FROM h_company a left join h_ammeter_info b on a.id = b.c_id
a.id=#id# a.oneAgentName like concat('%',#oneAgentName#,'%') a.twoAgentName like concat('%',#twoAgentName#,'%') a.servicerName like concat('%',#servicerName#,'%') b.pay_status=#pay_status# a.rateFlag=#rateFlag# a.name like concat('%',#name#,'%') a.contact_name like concat('%',#contact_name#,'%') a.contact_phone like concat('%',#contact_phone#,'%') a.status=#status# a.rec_phone=#rec_phone# b.ammeter_no like concat('%',#paymentNo#,'%') a.create_time>=#startTime# a.create_time<=#endTime#
a.oneAgentOpenId=#oneAgentOpenId#
a.oneAgentOpenId=#oneAgentOpenId# and a.twoAgentOpenID is null
a.oneAgentOpenId=#oneAgentOpenId# and a.twoAgentOpenID is not null
) as myTable

SELECT DISTINCT(a.id),a.name,a.user_id,a.contact_name,a.contact_phone,a.contact_mail,a.fp_name,a.fp_phone,a.fp_telephone,a.fp_address,a.fax,a.fax_ext,a.ywyId,a.status,a.create_time,a.verify_reason,a.verify_user_id,a.com_bank_code,a.verify_status,a.com_license_no,a.com_license_img,a.com_tax_no,a.com_tax_img,a.com_dept_code,a.com_dept_img,a.com_duty_no,a.com_bank_name,a.com_account_name,a.com_account_no,a.remark1,a.remark2,a.remark3,a.remark4,a.remark5,a.remark6, a.credit_code,a.com_license_start,a.com_license_end,a.province_code,a.city_code,a.area_code,a.com_address,a.com_zip_code,a.zp_code,a.zp_province_code,a.zp_city_code,a.zp_area_code,a.zp_address, a.zp_area_number,a.zp_phone,a.zp_bank_code,a.zp_bank_account,a.zp_verify_status,a.verify_status_time,a.zp_verify_time,a.zp_verify_creater_id,a.update_time,a.update_operator_id ,a.com_business_doc_type, a.oneAgentOpenId,a.oneAgentName,a.twoAgentOpenID,a.twoAgentName,a.servicerId,a.servicerName,a.rec_phone,a.rateFlag FROM h_company a left join h_ammeter_info b on a.id = b.c_id
a.id=#id# a.oneAgentName like concat('%',#oneAgentName#,'%') a.twoAgentName like concat('%',#twoAgentName#,'%') a.servicerName like concat('%',#servicerName#,'%') a.oneAgentOpenId=#oneAgentOpenId# a.rateFlag=#rateFlag# a.twoAgentOpenID=#twoAgentOpenID# a.servicerId=#servicerId# a.name like concat('%',#name#,'%') a.contact_name like concat('%',#contact_name#,'%') a.contact_phone like concat('%',#contact_phone#,'%') a.status=#status# b.pay_status=#pay_status# b.rec_phone=#rec_phone# b.ammeter_no like concat('%',#paymentNo#,'%') a.create_time>=#startTime# a.create_time<=#endTime#
order by $sortColumn$
limit #rowStart# , #rowCount#
SELECT count(*) FROM h_company a where a.id not in (select cId from h_proxy_message where cId<>#notid# ) a.name like concat('%',#name#,'%')
SELECT a.* FROM h_company a where a.id not in (select cId from h_proxy_message where cId<>#notid# ) a.name like concat('%',#name#,'%')

a.city_code=#city_code# a.area_code=#area_code# a.com_address=#com_address# a.com_zip_code=#com_zip_code# a.zp_code=#zp_code# a.zp_province_code=#zp_province_code# a.zp_city_code=#zp_city_code# a.zp_area_code=#zp_area_code# a.zp_address=#zp_address# a.zp_area_number=#zp_area_number# a.zp_phone=#zp_phone# a.zp_bank_code=#zp_bank_code# a.zp_bank_account=#zp_bank_account# a.zp_verify_status=#zp_verify_status# a.verify_status_time=#verify_status_time# a.zp_verify_time=#zp_verify_time# a.zp_verify_creater_id=#zp_verify_creater_id# a.update_time=#update_time# a.update_operator_id=#update_operator_id# a.com_business_doc_type=#com_business_doc_type# a.create_time>=#startTime# a.create_time<=#endTime#
a.id not in (SELECT DISTINCT a.id FROM h_company a left join h_pay_order b on a.id = b.c_id where b.create_time>=#startTimeOrder# and b.create_time<=#endTimeOrder# and b.o_id is not null )
order by $sortColumn$

SELECT DISTINCT a.id,a.id,a.name,a.user_id,a.contact_name,a.contact_phone,a.contact_mail,a.fp_name,a.fp_phone,a.fp_telephone,a.fp_address,a.fax,a.fax_ext,a.ywyId,a.status,a.create_time,a.verify_reason,a.verify_user_id,a.com_bank_code,a.verify_status,a.com_license_no,a.com_license_img,a.com_tax_no,a.com_tax_img,a.com_dept_code,a.com_dept_img,a.com_duty_no,a.com_bank_name,a.com_account_name,a.com_account_no,a.remark1,a.remark2,a.remark3,a.remark4,a.remark5,a.remark6, a.credit_code,a.com_license_start,a.com_license_end,a.province_code,a.city_code,a.area_code,a.com_address,a.com_zip_code,a.zp_code,a.zp_province_code,a.zp_city_code,a.zp_area_code,a.zp_address, a.zp_area_number,a.zp_phone,a.zp_bank_code,a.zp_bank_account,a.zp_verify_status,a.verify_status_time,a.zp_verify_time,a.zp_verify_creater_id,a.update_time,a.update_operator_id ,a.com_business_doc_type, a.oneAgentOpenId,a.oneAgentName,a.twoAgentOpenID,a.twoAgentName,a.servicerId,a.servicerName,a.rec_phone,a.rateFlag FROM h_company a left join (select * from h_pay_order where create_time>=#startTimeOrder# and create_time<=#endTimeOrder#) b on a.id = b.c_id
a.id=#id# b.pay_status=#pay_status# a.oneAgentOpenId=#oneAgentOpenId# a.twoAgentOpenID=#twoAgentOpenID# a.rateFlag=#rateFlag# a.servicerId=#servicerId# a.oneAgentName like concat('%',#oneAgentName#,'%') a.twoAgentName like concat('%',#twoAgentName#,'%') a.servicerName like concat('%',#servicerName#,'%') a.id<>#notid# a.name like concat('%',#name#,'%') a.user_id=#user_id# a.contact_name like concat('%',#contact_name#,'%') a.contact_phone like concat('%',#contact_phone#,'%') a.contact_mail like concat('%',#contact_mail#,'%') a.fp_name=#fp_name# a.fp_phone=#fp_phone# a.rec_phone=#rec_phone# a.fp_telephone=#fp_telephone# a.fp_address=#fp_address# a.fax like concat('%',#fax#,'%') a.fax =#faxFlag# a.fax_ext like concat('%',#fax_ext#,'%') a.ywyId=#ywyId# a.status=#status# to_days(a.create_time) = to_days(#create_time#) a.verify_reason=#verify_reason# a.verify_user_id=#verify_user_id# a.com_bank_code=#com_bank_code# a.com_license_no=#com_license_no# a.com_license_img=#com_license_img# a.com_tax_no=#com_tax_no# a.com_tax_img=#com_tax_img# a.com_dept_code=#com_dept_code# a.com_dept_img=#com_dept_img# a.remark4=#remark4# a.remark5=#remark5# a.remark6=#remark6# a.credit_code=#credit_code# a.com_license_start=#com_license_start# a.com_license_end=#com_license_end# a.province_code=#province_code# a.city_code=#city_code# a.area_code=#area_code# a.com_address=#com_address# a.com_zip_code=#com_zip_code# a.zp_code=#zp_code# a.zp_province_code=#zp_province_code# a.zp_city_code=#zp_city_code# a.zp_area_code=#zp_area_code# a.zp_address=#zp_address# a.zp_area_number=#zp_area_number# a.zp_phone=#zp_phone# a.zp_bank_code=#zp_bank_code# a.zp_bank_account=#zp_bank_account# a.zp_verify_status=#zp_verify_status# a.verify_status_time=#verify_status_time# a.zp_verify_time=#zp_verify_time# a.zp_verify_creater_id=#zp_verify_creater_id# a.update_time=#update_time#
